title: Report a Safety Incident
description: A worker has suffered a minor injury on site. The site supervisor must log an incident report.

tasks.description: Create a new incident report in the safety management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully initiates a new report.

tasks.description: Enter the details of the incident: person involved, location, date, description of the injury, and initial treatment provided.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly fills in all the required incident details.

tasks.description: Submit the report, which is then routed to the project EHS manager for investigation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent submits the report, and it is assigned to the EHS manager.
